data.title: Excellent donuts and nice people
data.text: In Tulsa area, only Krispy Kreme has better donuts than Top Spot.  Top Spot has an excellent selection and they always taste fresh.

data.title: Everything You Could Want!
data.text:
In Oklahoma, Daylight Donuts is everywhere. They taste good, they're fairly consistent, but lack personality and uniqueness. So when I see a place that is NOT Daylight, I jump on it. 

This particular day the staff was stretched thin. Only two people were manning the counter, which is at least half as many people as any other place. Despite the long line and the employees looking like they could use a 5 minute breather, I received excellent customer service! Yes, I'm mentioning customer service first for a donut place!

I had never been here so I asked, "What's popular?" The employee showed me a few things and even gave me a buttermilk cruller for free because she said I had to try it! I snagged a handful of other donuts and some jalapeno sausage rolls. 

It was all delicious. I've been dreaming about that cruller and the sausage rolls ever since. I don't live nearby but next time I'm the neighborhood, I know where I'm grabbing breakfast!
